column2: China and United States draw 1-1 BEIJING , Feb 1 ( AFP ) - China and the United States drew 1-1 in a soccer friendly at Guangzhou Saturday , the last of a two-match series , the Xinhua news agency reported .
A man was killed and another seriously wounded Tuesday when a leftover Israeli `` suspicious object '' blew up at a school in east Lebanon 's ancient city of Baalbek , local NBN television reported .
